install_msg:
thank for adding my repo
 feel free to message me on discord or create a github issue if you need support or help with anything.
short: some random cogs I made for my own use and decided to make public.
description: allows you to set a message to send whenever a user sends a message  .
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs and also the custom message for the purposes of creating a custom message when a certain user talks in a server.
